title: Modern Duplex Haven Steps From Kazimierz Dolny’s Rynek
description: Experience stylish living in this distinct two-level duplex boasting 5 spacious bedrooms and 3 sleek bathrooms. The open-concept layout showcases a vibrant modern façade, and large windows fill the residence with energizing natural light. Secure peace of mind with 24/7 security and a fully integrated security system while recharging your electric vehicle with ease at the dedicated EV charging station.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in the charming Rynek neighborhood, this property offers an unmatched blend of tranquility and energy. Enjoy strolls along the nearby beautiful Vistula waterfront, surrounded by green spaces in a dog-friendly, low-traffic environment. You’re perfectly placed to enjoy quick highway access for both local adventures and weekend escapes, marrying rural charm with modern convenience.
lifestyle_benefits: Serene, natural setting with easy access to road travel
Space for creative or coworking nook
target_buyer: Perfect for young professionals or digital nomads seeking a curl-loft blend, who value security, sustainable features, and proximity to nature with seamless digital connectivity.
market_positioning: A standout modern duplex in Kazimierz Dolny, this property delivers high-end security, style, and flexible living within a coveted, tranquil neighborhood, positioning it as the top choice for remote workers or families wanting grenery and convenience well below top metro market prices.
